H0.text: Who was the Georgia Peach. Jackie Robinson

H1.text: Who was the Georgia Peach. Hank Aaron

H2.text: Who was the Georgia Peach. Jimmy Carter

H3.text: Who was the Georgia Peach. Ty Cobb

A4.text: Georgia governor Brian Kemp ordered flags in the state of Georgia to be lowered half-staff in honor of him.

A5.text: As an adopted son of Atlanta, Mr. Aaron was part of the fabric that helped place Atlanta on the world stage.
